short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide clues you have already filled on the New York Times Crossword.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button that hides the filled in clues on the New York Times Crossword. Useful for when you want to see all your remaining clues at once.
